long_description: Worn alone or as a base layer, the Patagonia Active Cami Top offers smooth, moisture-wicking support for any activity where a touch of extra warmth is a bonus. Quick-drying, soft fabric blend with moisture-wicking performance helps keep you dry; fabric features high recycled content. Supportive design features a built-in shelf bra and straps with adjustable, nonslip shoulder straps. Seamless construction reduces chafing. Extended hem offers extra coverage to pair with low-rise pants, shorts or skirts. The Patagonia Active Cami Top for women is formfitting. Item is 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
short_description: Worn alone or as a base layer, the Patagonia Active Cami Top offers smooth, moisture-wicking support for any activity where a touch of extra warmth is a bonus.
